tool_description: Open-source API that provides Metal bands name & band logo
title: MetalBandsApi

api_list.name: /bands
api_list.description: gives u all the bandes provided by the api
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://metalbandsapi.p.rapidapi.com/bands"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "metalbandsapi.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
